title: Handle Security Incident on a Vehicle
description: A train operator uses an emergency button to report a disruptive passenger. A controller must coordinate a response.

tasks.description: Receive an emergency alert from a specific train.
tasks.expected_outcome: The controller is immediately notified of the incident.

tasks.description: Establish radio contact with the train operator to get details about the situation.
tasks.expected_outcome: The controller understands the nature of the security threat.

tasks.description: Contact the transit police and provide them with the train's location and direction of travel.
tasks.expected_outcome: Law enforcement is notified and given accurate information.

tasks.description: Instruct the train operator to stop at the next station and wait for police to arrive.
tasks.expected_outcome: The train is held at the station to allow police to board and handle the situation.
